title: Provision VPN for New Business Customer
description: A new enterprise customer requires a secure VPN tunnel to be configured between their office and the telecom network.

tasks.description: Retrieve the VPN configuration parameters from the customer's service order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets the required IP addresses, encryption type, and pre-shared key.

tasks.description: Apply the VPN configuration to the edge router serving the customer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully configures the VPN tunnel on the router.

tasks.description: Run a connectivity test to ensure the VPN tunnel is active and passing traffic.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent pings the customer's internal IP through the tunnel and gets a successful reply.
